attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the news today 26/1/07 the NHS are going to give money or shopping voucher to help the drug addicts of this country.Why?? When the Nhs can't even supply the many people in this country with threatment for cancer and other diseases. They chose that way of life, the people that have cancer etc didn't.Please support this e petition and lets try and put people power back into our country!!!

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
